text:
@LuckyHeronSay @BBCBreakfast @BBCNews It'll be intresting to see the bbc lead with.the uk hits the top spot of the European league in the death's column due to the coronavirus. 
And if any MSM papers lead on there front pages.and show some fucking outrage. As 4 the app your having a laugh.
